actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 with regard to the definition of the term "city" as it is used in that Act.

summary.text: Redefines the term "city" for Title I of the Housing and Community Development Act to exclude any town or township which contains within its boundaries no incorporated places as defined by the United States Bureau of the Census.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 with regard to the definition of the term "city" as it is used in that Act.
